q: down with David Letterman to talk about the Super Bowl, Green Bay and of course Brett Favre came up in conversation. When asked whether Brett Favre 's wishy-washy decision to retire had any affect on him: I was the guy that took all the reps in the off season, and he was the guy who took all the reps during the season. So, that's kind-of how it worked out, said Aaron Rodgers . Aaron Rodgers topped off his David Letterman appearance with a good ol' pigskin toss to David Letterman . Tony Dungy said. Hear the entire interview in this CBS Philly SportsPod... Tony Dungy says he truly marveled over some of the things Michael Vick was able to do this season for the Eagles. He was calm in the pocket, he was hitting second, third, fourth receivers, throwing the ball well and just being in command of things. And then still with that ability to escape and get away from the rush and make plays out of nothing, Tony Dungy told KYW Newsradio.
